title: parindu vandu
sahitya:
parindu vandudavAyO paramA pArttennai irangAyO


anupallavi

  erindu karinda vITTil ettanai nAL iruppEn


caraNam    eDutta kAriyattai keDuttiDum vanjargaL ettanai koDuttAlum igazhndiDum kanjargaL
iDattaik-koDuttAlO maDattai piDunguginra ettarai Eningu vaittAi appA
vaDitta kaNNIruDan piDittEn un pAdamE vAzhEn unai allAdu tOzhA ennaiyALap-
